title: Lovely 2 BDR/ 2 BA Condo w/ Downtown Views! www.RentalsInSF.com
posting_body: Pet: No Cat, Small Dogs Only
945 Corbett Ave #308 is located in Upper Market/ Twin Peaks area
This immaculate unit includes breathtaking, panoramic views of downtown SF.
There is a large living room with a functional fireplace (converted to gas logs).
Carpets in master bedroom and living room, hardwood floors elsewhere.
Great closet space throughout the apartment.
Kitchen includes: dishwasher, built-in electric range, dual built-in ovens, refrigerator, microwave oven, large sink with pull-out faucet and small disposal sink master bedroom.
The first en-suite bathroom comes with dual sinks, dual shower heads in shower.
The Second bathroom includes a shower over tub.
One car parking in garage is available.
- One car garage parking space available for $200/mo
- Pet negotiable: additional deposit and restrictions apply
- Fresh NEW modern white paint throughout
- NEW carpets in Master BDR and LR
- 2 large bedrooms: One Master Bedroom with ensuite bath and large closet space, Second large bedroom with good closet space
- 2 baths: One in master and one in hallway
- Private balcony with city and bay views off the living room

Within walking distance to Noe Valley restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets (Whole Foods, Mollie Stone, Safeway) Two-minute walk to MUNI for access to Castro and downtown San Francisco Easy access 101 and I-280 from Glen Park
Broker - Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117
